vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.33;
father of: Jonathan (H3083J); also called Shagee (KJV: Shage) at 1Ch.11.34;
Another name of sham.mah (שַׁמָּה "Shammah" H8048I)
§ Shage = "erring"
father of Hannathon the Hararite, one of David's mighty warriors
vocabInfos._es_Definition: ararita; guerrero; en tiempos de David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
沙基 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "有過錯的"
大衛的大能勇士哈拉人約拿單的父親 (代上11:34)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
沙基 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "有过错的"
大卫的大能勇士哈拉人约拿单的父亲 (代上11:34)
